mapper.select: SELECT i.product_code, p.product_name, sum(inventory_qy) as inventory_qy FROM inventory i join product_info p ON i.product_code = p.product_code WHERE product_se = 'PT02' GROUP BY i.product_code, p.product_name

SELECT i.lot, p.product_name, get_comm(i.product_size) as product_size, i.product_color, i.inventory_qy, i.store_charger FROM inventory i join product_info p ON i.product_code = p.product_code WHERE i.product_size = #{sizeCode} AND i.product_color = #{color} AND i.product_code = #{productCode} AND i.inventory_qy > 0
